title: ExoMars PanCam Continuation of Funds to Mar2010
abstractText: This proposal is for a nine-month grant to allow work on the ExoMars PanCam wide angle stereo cameras to proceed through the ExoMars Project consolidation phase. The grant follows on from the most-recent 15-month bridging grant (STFC Ref.: ST/G003203/1) That grant follows on from the first & second six-month bridging grants (STFC Ref.: PP/F00107X/1 & ST/F008678/1).
